author: David Gilbert, VICE News
title: Dr. Fauci Says We Need a Nationwide Lockdown and We Need It Now
description: "I don't understand why that's not happening."
content: There should be a national stay-at-home order to combat the spread of the coronavirus, said Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases and a member of the Trump administrations coronavirus task force, on Thurs… [+4391 chars]
